last_episode_to_air.name: Pilot
last_episode_to_air.overview: A beautiful and powerful historical story set in the period from August 1913. (after the defeat of Serbia in the Balkan raids when it regained deo territory) until the end of 1915 (the Austro-Hungarian occupation of Belgrade and Serbia). Nikola Stanimirovic, a young Serbian officer, the main hero of the story, returned to his hometown. His wedding is traditionally scheduled, but the death of Sofia, the daughter of the Austro-Hungarian envoy Ota Baumana, has caught the eye of the eye. Inadmissible at that time, a flirtatious young lady, does not hide her feelings. The outcome of these love dramas took place in the real historical period before the Great Rat in a multitude of dramatic adventures, espionage intrigues, diplomatic outwit, political intrigues and riots ...

name: Crveni Mesec
overview: A beautiful and powerful historical story set in the period from August 1913. (after the defeat of Serbia in the Balkan raids when it regained deo territory) until the end of 1915 (the Austro-Hungarian occupation of Belgrade and Serbia). Nikola Stanimirovic, a young Serbian officer, the main hero of the story, returned to his hometown. His wedding is traditionally scheduled, but the death of Sofia, the daughter of the Austro-Hungarian envoy Ota Baumana, has caught the eye of the eye. Inadmissible at that time, a flirtatious young lady, does not hide her feelings. The outcome of these love dramas took place in the real historical period before the Great Rat in a multitude of dramatic adventures, espionage intrigues, diplomatic outwit, political intrigues and riots ...
